marklogic.body:
A colored kid resorted to violence, first. He maliciously assaulted Zimmerman, and then tried to kill him on the sidewalk by bashing in his head. ZImmerman, the victim, Acting in self-defense, pulled and fired one shot.
The colored kid Bled out and died.
When we look at the background and facts, we hear of stories of the colored kid selling "plant", throwing punches at bus drivers, and being suspended multiple times. A 6'3" colored male sporting a gold grill, tattoos, and a twitter name that would get a white person assaulted if he uttered it amongst mixed company.
